title: How to Be a Kamikaze Oracle in Forge on Halo 3

steps.headline: Enter a Forge session with other players.
steps.description: The Forge can be accessed between the 'Custom Games' and 'Theater' options on the Halo 3 main screen. Any map will suffice, but preferably one with some kind of walled structure.

steps.headline: Make sure you are enabled to enter editor mode (press UP on your D-Pad to enter editor mode, and again to exit editor mode back into normal player mode) as you will need to enter editor mode later on.
steps.description: Sometimes the host of the Forge session can block others from using editor mode, so if this has happened, make sure he lets you use it.

steps.headline: Collect a few plasma grenades while in player mode.
steps.description: If there aren't any, create a few by entering the Forge object menus and placing them on the map.

steps.headline: Find a tall, perfectly vertical wall and stand at the bottom of the wall looking up.
Throw a plasma grenade up along the wall and stand below it.
steps.description: Try to throw it so that the grenade 'skims' the wall as it goes up so it is basically right above you.

steps.headline: Try to make the plasma grenade land on you - basically you are trying to stick yourself with your own grenade, so you will need to anticipate where it will land.
steps.description: This may take a few tries, so be patient. Crouching may increase your chances of success since you have a larger area for the grenade to stick on.

steps.headline: Enter editor mode as soon as the grenade sticks to you.
steps.description: You must be quick on pressing UP on your D-Pad to enter editor mode before the grenade explodes on you. Once in editor mode however, the grenade will not kill you until you exit editor mode again. You may function as normal in other respects however.

steps.headline: Find another player, preferably an enemy in order to maximize the damage you will cause.
steps.description: Finding one which is unaware of your presence or of what you are doing is even better, as they will not know what hit them.

steps.headline: Move in close to the intended victim and press UP on your D-Pad to re-enter player mode.
steps.description: You will explode instantly from the plasma grenade which you stuck to yourself and hopefully kill the person you were next to (or at least give them a fright if you weren't close enough). It will count as suicide, but you will get the kill point if you manage to kill the person you were next to as well.

steps.headline: Repeat and show your friends how to be a kamikaze Oracle too.
steps.description: It may get boring if everyone continues to do it, but it will keep Forge sessions exciting for a while.

text: Enter a Forge session with other players. The Forge can be accessed between the 'Custom Games' and 'Theater' options on the Halo 3 main screen. Any map will suffice, but preferably one with some kind of walled structure. Make sure you are enabled to enter editor mode (press UP on your D-Pad to enter editor mode, and again to exit editor mode back into normal player mode) as you will need to enter editor mode later on. Sometimes the host of the Forge session can block others from using editor mode, so if this has happened, make sure he lets you use it. Collect a few plasma grenades while in player mode. If there aren't any, create a few by entering the Forge object menus and placing them on the map. Find a tall, perfectly vertical wall and stand at the bottom of the wall looking up.  Throw a plasma grenade up along the wall and stand below it. Try to throw it so that the grenade 'skims' the wall as it goes up so it is basically right above you. Try to make the plasma grenade land on you - basically you are trying to stick yourself with your own grenade, so you will need to anticipate where it will land. This may take a few tries, so be patient. Crouching may increase your chances of success since you have a larger area for the grenade to stick on. Enter editor mode as soon as the grenade sticks to you. You must be quick on pressing UP on your D-Pad to enter editor mode before the grenade explodes on you. Once in editor mode however, the grenade will not kill you until you exit editor mode again. You may function as normal in other respects however. Find another player, preferably an enemy in order to maximize the damage you will cause. Finding one which is unaware of your presence or of what you are doing is even better, as they will not know what hit them. Move in close to the intended victim and press UP on your D-Pad to re-enter player mode. You will explode instantly from the plasma grenade which you stuck to yourself and hopefully kill the person you were next to (or at least give them a fright if you weren't close enough). It will count as suicide, but you will get the kill point if you manage to kill the person you were next to as well. Repeat and show your friends how to be a kamikaze Oracle too. It may get boring if everyone continues to do it, but it will keep Forge sessions exciting for a while.
